talk0070:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That is all I have on hand. Please wait
until I have processed more.
talk0071:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you.<sp:0:4:0>I will process this zonaite later.<sp:0:4:0>The resulting materials will be available to
you once the processing is complete.
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>I <clr:0000>process zonaite<clr:ffff> here into other
materials.<sp:0:4:0>I am willing to accept <clr:0000>zonaite<clr:ffff> in exchange
for processed materials.
talk0080:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy><clr:0000>Zonaite <clr:ffff>is <clr:0000>processed<clr:ffff> by smelting it in
a furnace. <sp:5:0:0>It is thereby converted into
materials with useful properties.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Zonai charges<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff>
are two such examples.
talk0110:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Crystallized charges <clr:ffff>are a solidified form
of Zonai charges.<sp:0:4:0>We mainly use them as raw material in the
construction of <clr:0000>Energy Cells<clr:ffff>.
talk0140:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Please visit again once this batch has
been processed.
talk0141:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A selection of processed materials is
arrayed on the nearby shelves.<sp:0:4:0>See if any of them catch your interest.
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>You do not have enough zonaite.
Please come again once you have
brought enough.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>I am detecting a large number of items in
your possession. I recommend disposing
of some of them.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Welcome. I am a <clr:0000>Forge Construct<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I <clr:0000>process zonaite <clr:ffff>here into other
materials.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>These are materials that have been
processed from the ore.<sp:0:4:0>I am willing to accept <clr:0000>zonaite <clr:ffff>in exchange
for processed materials.
talk0060:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you.<sp:0:4:0>I will process this zonaite into
new materials.
talk0003:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Zonaite <clr:ffff>is a substance that can be mined
in great quantities in this land.<sp:0:4:0>I am capable of <clr:0000>processing <clr:ffff>this substance
and converting it into a variety of things.<sp:0:4:0>Here. <sp:5:0:0>Allow me to show you what can be
processed from zonaite.
talk0090:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Zonaite <clr:ffff>is a green substance that can be
mined in great quantities in this land.<sp:0:4:0>I am capable of <clr:0000>processing <clr:ffff>this substance
and converting it into a variety of things.
talk0091:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>There is also a concentrated form called
<clr:0000>large zonaite<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>It is extremely useful.
talk0120:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Zonai charges<clr:ffff> are what <clr:0000>power <clr:ffff>Zonai<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
devices and constructs.<sp:0:4:0>A charge can be consumed to <clr:0000>replenish
your Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>It can also be fed into device dispensers
to <clr:0000>produce Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.
talk0150:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That is a precious mineral which is already
slated for processing.<sp:0:4:0>It would pose difficulties for me if you
took it for yourself.
talk0151:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There are examples of processed
materials available on the nearby shelves.<sp:0:4:0>I encourage you to examine them to see
if there are any you want.
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>I am engaged in processing zonaite into
other materials.
